response:

Initially, Alice is playing cheerleader, Bob is playing right winger, and Claire is playing goalkeeper.

After Alice and Claire trade positions, Alice will now play as a midfielder (since she was initially a cheerleader), and Claire will still be playing as a goalkeeper. 

Then, Bob and Alice trade positions, so Bob will now play as the midfielder, and Alice will still be playing as a cheerleader.

So, at the end of the match, Claire is playing as the goalkeeper.
